message: Don't worry it is! We have ads (or have had in the past) ways to reduce fat in your diet, increase the amount of iron, ads for pork and how it is leaner than some other meats, ads for fruit and veg (2 fruit and 5 veg a day). Some of them are aimed at kids and some for adults.

Yep this is just something extra she could do specifically for other families with a disabled member. That's no bad thing. If I was entitled to DLA for having a disabled son but earnt literally millions and millions of pounds I would donate it to families with more need than I. I actually have a disabled brother and DLA is very strict and they're constantly reviewing it, reducing the amount and trying to take away the help he needs. Therefore I can think of a few families who aren't mega rich who are probably in the same boat as my brother and struggling.

In Pharoahs day, both the Arabs and the Jews were Black Africans. There were never any white people enslaved in Egypt. But there were Black slaves in Egypt. Had there been whites enslaved in Egypt for 400 years, they would have surely documented it. How is it Egyptians documented black slaves; but never showed any white slaves. Because the Israelite slaves of Egypt were themselves Egyptians and Ethiopians and Nubians.
